pages.about: Linguistic Horizon - Language School in India | About us Home About us Get in touch Call us About our language school At Linguistic Horizon, we are passionate about empowering individuals to unlock the doors to a world of boundless communication and cultural understanding. Founded in 2005 by a team of language enthusiasts and educators, our language school has grown to become a premier destination for language learning in India. Our journey began with a simple yet profound belief – that language is the key to bridging cultures, fostering connections, and opening minds to new perspectives. We recognized the transformative power of language education and set out to create a learning environment that not only imparts linguistic skills but also instills a deep appreciation for diversity. Over the years, we have assembled a team of highly qualified and experienced instructors who bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the classroom. Our instructors are not merely teachers but ambassadors of language and culture, dedicated to guiding students on a journey of self-discovery and personal growth. At Linguistic Horizon, we believe in a holistic approach to language learning. Our comprehensive curriculum covers all aspects of language acquisition, including grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, listening, and speaking. We employ innovative teaching methodologies that cater to different learning styles, ensuring an engaging and effective learning experience for students of all ages and backgrounds. Beyond the classroom, we strive to create a vibrant community of language learners, fostering an environment of cultural exchange and camaraderie. Through extracurricular activities, language clubs, and immersive experiences, we encourage our students to embrace the richness of linguistic diversity and develop a global mindset. At the core of our mission lies a commitment to excellence and a passion for empowering individuals to transcend boundaries and unlock their full potential. We take pride in the success stories of our alumni, who have gone on to pursue their dreams, forge international connections, and contribute to a more interconnected world. Join us at Linguistic Horizon and embark on a transformative journey of language learning that will open doors to new horizons of personal and professional growth. Our Teaching Approach At Linguistic Horizon, we understand that effective language learning requires more than just memorization and repetition. Our teaching approach is built on a foundation of proven methodologies and a deep understanding of how individuals acquire and retain new languages. We believe in fostering an immersive learning environment that mirrors real-life scenarios and encourages active participation. Our instructors employ a communicative approach, emphasizing practical applications of the language through role-playing, discussions, and interactive activities. This hands-on approach not only enhances language proficiency but also builds confidence in using the language in everyday situations. Additionally, we incorporate technology into our teaching methods, leveraging multimedia resources, online platforms, and language learning apps to create a dynamic and engaging learning experience. These tools complement our in-class instruction, providing students with opportunities for self-paced practice and reinforcement. Furthermore, we recognize the importance of cultural awareness in language acquisition. Our curriculum seamlessly integrates cultural elements, allowing students to gain insights into the customs, traditions, and nuances associated with the language they are learning. This holistic approach fosters a deeper appreciation for the target language and its cultural context. At the heart of our teaching philosophy lies a commitment to personalized attention. Our small class sizes ensure that each student receives individualized guidance and support, tailored to their unique learning needs and goals. We believe in fostering a supportive and encouraging environment where students can freely express themselves, ask questions, and receive constructive feedback. Through our innovative and student-centered approach, we empower our learners to not only master the intricacies of a new language but also develop a lifelong love for linguistic exploration and cross-cultural understanding. 15+ Years of Experience 2,500+ Successful Graduates 20+ Languages Taught At Linguistic Horizon, we are dedicated to empowering individuals to unlock their linguistic potential and connect with the world through language. 151-B, Lane Number 3, Doon Vihar, Jakhan, Dehradun, Uttarakhand 248001, India +91 96 3411 1136 linguistichorizon@gmail.com Links Home About us Get in touch Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.contact: Linguistic Horizon - Language School in India | Get in touch Home About us Get in touch Call us Contact us I accept privacy policy Send message Our Learning Process 1 Assessment Every journey begins with understanding your starting point. We conduct comprehensive assessments to evaluate your current language proficiency level, learning style, and specific goals. This allows us to tailor the learning experience to your unique needs. 2 Personalized Curriculum Based on your assessment, our experienced instructors develop a personalized curriculum that focuses on the areas you need to improve while leveraging your strengths. We incorporate a balanced mix of grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, listening, and speaking exercises. 3 Interactive Lessons Our interactive lessons are designed to be engaging and immersive. Through role-playing, group discussions, multimedia resources, and real-life scenarios, you'll actively practice and apply the language in a supportive and encouraging environment. 4 Continuous Feedback Regular feedback is essential for effective learning. Our instructors closely monitor your progress and provide constructive feedback, helping you identify areas for improvement and celebrate your achievements along the way. 5 Cultural Immersion Language and culture go hand in hand. Throughout your learning journey, you'll be exposed to the cultural nuances, traditions, and customs associated with the language you're studying. This holistic approach fosters a deeper appreciation and understanding. 6 Continued Support Your learning journey doesn't end with the completion of your course. We provide ongoing support and resources to help you maintain and continue improving your language skills, ensuring lasting proficiency. Frequently Asked Questions What languages do you teach? At Linguistic Horizon, we offer courses in English, Hindi, French, Spanish, German, Mandarin Chinese, and several other popular languages. Our diverse language offerings cater to learners with various interests and goals. What are the class sizes? We believe in providing personalized attention to each student. Therefore, our class sizes are limited to a maximum of 10 students per class, ensuring an optimal learning environment with ample opportunities for interaction and individual support. Do you offer online or in-person classes? We offer both online and in-person classes to accommodate different learning preferences and schedules. Our online classes are conducted through a user-friendly virtual platform, while our in-person classes take place at our state-of-the-art language center. How long are the courses? The duration of our courses varies depending on the language and proficiency level. Typically, our beginner courses range from 3 to 6 months, intermediate courses last 6 to 9 months, and advanced courses are 9 to 12 months long. We also offer intensive and part-time options to fit different schedules. Do you provide course materials? Yes, we provide all the necessary course materials, including textbooks, workbooks, and supplementary resources. These materials are carefully curated and designed to support our comprehensive curriculum and enhance the learning experience. What are the qualifications of your instructors? Our instructors are highly qualified and experienced professionals who are either native speakers or possess advanced proficiency in the languages they teach. Many hold relevant degrees, certifications, and have extensive teaching experience in language education. At Linguistic Horizon, we are dedicated to empowering individuals to unlock their linguistic potential and connect with the world through language. 151-B, Lane Number 3, Doon Vihar, Jakhan, Dehradun, Uttarakhand 248001, India +91 96 3411 1136 linguistichorizon@gmail.com Links Home About us Get in touch Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions

pages.privacy: Linguistic Horizon - Language School in India | Privacy Policy Home About us Get in touch Call us Privacy Policy At Linguistic Horizon, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users' personal information. By using our website or services, you consent to the practices described in this policy. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information from you: Personal Information This includes your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you voluntarily provide when you fill out forms, register for courses, or communicate with us. We may also collect payment information, such as credit card details, when you enroll in our courses or make purchases. Usage Information We may collect information about how you use our website and services, including your IP address, browser type, device information, operating system, and browsing behavior. This information is collected automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for the following purposes: To provide, maintain, and improve our services and website To process your course enrollments and payments To communicate with you about our services, promotions, and updates To analyze and understand user behavior and preferences To personalize your experience and deliver relevant content and advertisements To comply with legal obligations and enforce our policies Information Sharing and Disclosure We may share your personal information in the following circumstances: With third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business activities, or providing services to you With affiliates, partners, or other trusted entities for the purposes of providing services to you or for marketing and promotional purposes When required by law, legal process, or government authorities To protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of others We may also share aggregated or de-identified information with third parties for research, marketing, or other purposes. Data Security We take reasonable measures to protect the security and confidentiality of your personal information. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. If a security breach occurs, we will take appropriate steps to investigate and mitigate the situation. Third-Party Links and Services Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not governed by this Privacy Policy. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those third parties. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites or services you visit. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. Your Rights and Choices You may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your data. You may also have the right to object to or restrict certain processing activities. To exercise these rights or for any other privacy-related inquiries, please contact us using the information provided below. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates or changes.
